description.raw:
list libignition-cmake1-dev as dep for ign-rendering, use prerelease repos for a couple weeks

before:

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64&build=7)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64/7/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64/7/

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=72)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/72/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/72/

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-artful-amd64&build=11)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-artful-amd64/11/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-artful-amd64/11/

after: 

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64&build=8)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64/8/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64/8/

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=34)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/34/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/34/

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64&build=73)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/73/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/73/

I made the cut-off date April 15. I'm not sure if ignition-cmake1 will be released by then or not, but we can extend the date if necessary.
description.html:
list libignition-cmake1-dev as dep for ign-rendering, use prerelease repos for a couple weeks

before:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64/7/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/33/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/72/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-artful-amd64/11/

after:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-artful-amd64/8/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/34/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-xenial-amd64/73/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-default-artful-amd64/12/

I made the cut-off date April 15. I'm not sure if ignition-cmake1 will be released by then or not, but we can extend the date if necessary.
